title: Ep 22: Circe Book Club and Hello From Cape Cod.
itunes:title: Ep 22: Circe Book Club and Hello From Cape Cod.
description:
This episode we're discussing our YA book of the month (even thought it's not really YA if you ask us), Circe by Madeline Miller. While a knowledge of Greek Mythology is definitely not mandatory to enjoy this book, if you loved mythology in school (we did!) this book will feel like a deeply personal reunion with all your mythology favs. We loved this book!!!

We recorded this episode in Grace's parents' living room on Cape Cod. Cape Cod was both of our highs of the week - Grace came for a week and Becca came for the weekend. So nice to get a little sunshine and relaxation!

Join us on August 22nd for our next Book Club to discuss Circe by Madeline Miller. And we will be putting out a call on Instagram for questions for our next advice episode!

Can't get enough Bad On Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast

itunes:author: Grace Atwood & Becca Freeman
